Package tuitions

Class Date

java.lang.Object
tuitions.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
The date class that's used for setting the payment date of each album. Use this class to check if a date is valid or not.
Author:
Tommy Cho

  • Method Details

    • dateString

      public String dateString()
      A method that converts a date object to a string. If there is no current date, return "--/--/--"
      Returns:
      the date in string form

    • febDays

      private int febDays(int year)
      A helper method that determines how many days february has.
      Parameters:
      year - the year of the date
      Returns:
      integer of days in february

    • daysInMonth

      private int daysInMonth(int month, int year)
      A helper method that outputs how many days in a specific month there is.
      Parameters:
      month - the month in date
      year - the year in date
      Returns:
      integer days in the month we're looking for

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      A method that determines if a date is valid or not
      Returns:
      true if the date is valid, false if otherwise

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date date)
      A method that compares a date with another one and returns a positive or negative number depending on which date was earlier
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      date - that is being compared
      Returns:
      positive int if the date of this is later than the param date that is being compared
